info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:55PM MDT until June 02 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARDING AND CENTRAL QUAY COUNTIES... At 455 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Logan to 8 miles northeast of Quay, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Logan, San Jon, Ute Lake State Park and Wheatland. This includes Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 337 and 356. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
